item.title: Grading coaching hires: Whittingham, Michigan agree to deal
item.description: As the coaching carousel continues to spin, we grade every major hire.

item.title: Purdy 'playing as good as it gets'; 49ers eye 1-seed
item.description: For the second week in a row, QB Brock Purdy accounted for five touchdowns as the 49ers outlasted the Bears 42-38 in a wild shootout on "Sunday Night ...

item.title: Ravens-Steelers on SNF to cap Week 18 slate
item.description: The NFL announced the full final-weekend schedule, with the marquee matchup between the Ravens and Steelers set to take place on "Sunday Night Footbal...

item.title: Ex-boxing champ Joshua injured in fatal crash
item.description: Anthony Joshua suffered minor injuries Monday in a car crash in Nigeria that killed two others.

item.title: Kawhi puts up career-high 55 for streaking Clips
item.description: Kawhi Leonard scored a career-high 55 points as the Clippers extended their winning streak with a victory over the Eastern Conference-leading Pistons.
